text: Misir walon mein say jiss ney ussay khareeda tha uss ney apni biwi say kaha issay boht izzat-o-ehtram kay sath rakho boht mumkin hai kay yeh humen faeeda phonchaye ya issay hum apna beta hi bana len yun to hum ney misir ki sir zamin yousuf ka qadam jama diya kay hum ussay khuwab ki tabeer ka kuch ilm sikha den. Allah apney iraday per ghalib hai lekin aksar log bey ilm hotay hain
